doc.title: The NBC Mystery Movie
doc.plot: The NBC Mystery Movie was an "umbrella title" for one of many mystery series shown on a rotating basis in the same time slot on Sunday nights on NBC. The original three series featured were Columbo (1971), _"McMillan & Wife" (1971)_ (qv) and _"McCloud" (1970)_ (qv). Later, several other (often short-lived) series were added to the rotation including _"Hec Ramsey" (1972)_ (qv), _"Banacek" (1972)_ (qv), _"Tenafly" (1973)_ (qv), _"The Snoop Sisters" (1973)_ (qv), and _"Amy Prentiss" (1974)_ (qv).
